title: Ace of the Human Resources Department Is Reincarnated as a Villain Girl Who Will Be Sentenced to Death Regardless of How She Gets Up! ï½žIf You Dress as a Man to Survive, You Will Live in a School as an Aide of a Ruthless Prince - Novel Updates
tags: Cross-dressing   Female Protagonist   Hiding True Identity   Nobles   Reincarnated in a Game World   Revenge   Royalty   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Autumn
description:
Zero experience in playing maiden games!

No love experience value!

I only have experience in the HR department!

Mika, who is such an office worker, is reincarnated as a villainous daughter who will be sentenced to death regardless of how she gets up!

The only way to survive is to dress up as a man and have a school life! ?>
